\begin{abstract}
A new approach for obtaining the transformations of solutions of nonlinear
ordinary differential equations representable as the compatibility condition
of the overdetermined linear systems is proposed.
The corresponding transformations of the solutions of the overdetermined
linear systems are derived in the frameworks of the Darboux transformation
technique.
\end{abstract}
